Comments_List: I am not sure how the dialect learning can be better integrated, but either it should be, or it should be omitted altogether. In its current form, it feels like something stacked to the Friday lessons. As we proceed, I'd also like to see more reading exercises.
Yes--this is an excellent introduction, although be prepared for a lot of work.
